headline: Is Emerson Electric Still Attractive After Its Automation Shift and 83.4% Five Year Surge?
summary: If you are wondering whether Emerson Electric at around $134 a share is still a smart buy or if most of the upside is already priced in, this breakdown will help you decide. The stock is up 2.6% over the last week but down 3.7% over the past month, while still holding a 10.4% gain year to date and rising 83.4% over five years. Recent headlines have highlighted Emerson's push deeper into industrial automation and software driven solutions, as it reshapes the portfolio toward higher growth,...

headline: Emerson and Armexa Collaborate to Provide Expanded Cybersecurity Services for DeltaV Automation Platform Customers
summary: HOUSTON, December 04, 2025--Global automation company Emerson and Armexa today announced a strategic collaboration to offer customers using Emerson’s DeltaV™ automation platform, a global suite of advanced operational technology (OT) cybersecurity services. The collaboration gives DeltaV customers the option to have a single, authorized cybersecurity services provider to simplify vendor management, accelerate project timelines, and enhance operational resilience across their entire OT environmen
